quest.name: It's Electric!
journal:
Stigma-4 has a shocking request.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Speak with the guardian Ea and mount the Miw Miisv.
Use Electric Flux to electrify intellectuals.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Commencing status report. Analysis of infantile Miw Miisv on Elysion indicates advanced proficiency in generating electrical stimuli.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Verbal testimony from guardian Ea suggests contact with said bimodal output results in distinctive “sensations” in the non-corporeal subject. Such subjective experiences are predicted to positively impact environmental dynamis.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Requesting assistance from closest organic life-form. Forename, please report to the abode of the Ea and receive instruction on the electrocution of consenting non-corporeal beings.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621A
dialogue.text: You must be the corporeal one I am to instruct. Very good─I would have you guide this Miw Miisv to administer electrotherapeutics upon two of my brethren whose rumination often takes them to Hollow of the Flesh.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621A
dialogue.text: Unadulterated lightning is quite striking, you know. The semifluidity of your form suggests a tendency towards parboiling, but you are nevertheless free to partake should you desire swift liberation from your mortal coil.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621A
dialogue.text: Did this child's movements overwhelm you? I do hope you make up in determination what your corporeal form so evidently lacks in coordination.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621B
dialogue.text: If there were but stimuli strong enough to rouse me from this torpor...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with the guardian Ea to mount the Miw Miisv and electrify intellectuals.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621B
dialogue.text: My appendages tingle─my mind races! My thoughts transcend, I grasp the universe's innermost secrets...aaand they're gone. Profane exclamations!

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621B
dialogue.text: Transcendence, woooooo! ...Ahem. I mean, of course, that you may proceed to anoint me with the stimuli.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with the guardian Ea to mount the Miw Miisv and electrify intellectuals.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621B
dialogue.text: Aaaaaaaaah! Cascades of revelation, oceans of understanding! The risk of dependency looms, but the mind wants what it wants!

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621B
dialogue.text: ...Ahem. Do pardon my outburst─although we no longer possess the nervous systems of mortal meat sacks, one's consciousness still craves the occasional refreshment.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621B
dialogue.text: But to think that similar impulses once coursed throughout our systems at the slightest movement... How delightfully primitive!

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621B
dialogue.text: Yes, I believe we shall soon grasp the nature of our erstwhile selves with regular exposure to these sensations. Do come and stimulate me again.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621C
dialogue.text: Pardon me, but I cannot but notice your current engulfment. Could you possibly facilitate the experience of “sensation”? My colleagues expound much upon its benefits, of late...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with the guardian Ea to mount the Miw Miisv and electrify intellectuals.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621C
dialogue.text: Th-This is it! The very pseudo-physical euphoria I have heard so much about!

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621C
dialogue.text: At last, you return! My colleagues strive to surpass my comprehension─you must facilitate my stimulation at once.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with the guardian Ea to mount the Miw Miisv and electrify intellectuals.

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621C
dialogue.text: My psyche tingles! My consciousness sings!

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621C
dialogue.text: With this stimulation, I feel assured of my comprehension of “sensation”─yet one question still plagues my mind. If the classic corporeal creature spends its waking moments inundated by such perceptions, how does it manage to accomplish anything at all?

dialogue.name: EAOMIA04621C
dialogue.text: Already I am consumed by the urge to succumb to temptation once more... But no─I must not relinquish my rationality. I shall ensure that my colleagues recognize my superior understanding ere delving into the pleasures of the imagined flesh...

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Return of Forename confirmed. Elevated levels of static electricity detected. Requesting summary of completed mission.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Verbal analysis complete. Subjects successfully achieved states of agitation and fleeting delusion of corporeal status by means of severe electrocution. Mission success.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Nicety protocol engaged. Well done, Forename. Please accept this shiny recompense and lend your services to our cause once more.
